title: No separate compensation shall be given for areas under Regulation No
clause_text: No separate compensation shall be given for areas under Regulation No.31 (1). BUA for the construction of staircase/lift/staircase and lift lobby & other areas as per 31(1) shall not be counted in BUA to be handed over and shall be without charging premium for built up amenity under AR.

source_pdf.text_snippet: No separate compensation shall be given for areas under Regulation No.31 (1). BUA for the construction of staircase/lift/staircase and lift lobby & other areas as per 31(1) shall not be counted in BUA
